13. Nxe5 !! - This stunning sacrifice forces mate in I think all variations.   These variations are as follows. 

Variation A
13. Nxe5  Ke8 
14. Nf6  Ke7 
15. Nxc6  bxc6 
16. Ng4  f6 
17. Bxf6  Ke8 
18. Qd8# 

Variation B
12. Nd5  Kd7 
13. Nxe5  Nxe5 
14. Nb6  Kc6 
15. Qd5  Kxb6 
16. Qb5# 

Variation C
13. Nxe5  Ke6 
14. Nxc7  Kxe5 
15. Qd5# 

Variation D
13. Nxe5  Kd6 
14. Nc3  Kxe5 
15. Qd5# 

Variation E
13. Nxe5  Kd6 
14. Nc3  Kc5 
15. Qd5  Kb4 
16. a3# 

I now set up some conditional moves.
14. ............ Ke8 - white shortens Variation B and now I deliver mate on d8.  This is just surreal.
